message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with a machine learning problem involving contextual bandits, which is a subfield of machine learning and falls under the category of "Learning" in computer science. The problem also involves global knapsack constraints, which is a type of optimization problem and falls under the category of "Discrete Mathematics" in computer science. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is "cs.LG" (Machine Learning), followed by "cs.AI" (Artificial Intelligence) and "cs.DS" (Data Structures and Algorithms). The problem also involves game theory and computational complexity, which are covered by "cs.GT" (Computer Science and Game Theory) and "cs.CC" (Computational Complexity), respectively.
